front.title: Analysis of Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS)-based Recovery Mechanisms (including Protection and Restoration)

abstract.t: This document provides an analysis grid to evaluate, compare and contrast the Generalized Multi-Protocol Label Switching (GMPLS) protocol suite capabilities with respect to the recovery mechanisms currently proposed at the IETF CCAMP Working Group. A detailed analysis of each of the recovery phases is provided using the terminology defined in a companion document. This document focuses on transport plane survivability and recovery issues and not on control plane resilience and related aspects.
